system.description: A player trying to control the mob rolls +Blood.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You’re the new target of their wrath. Charismatic threats can use a Cut to change the target of a mob’s wrath, but it takes time.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: They change the target of their anger, but the Overlord will tell you what they’re mad at now.

success.label: Success!
success.value: Their anger is now pointed wherever you want it to be.
